activities: BSG Wireless provides Wi-Fi interconnection, data and financial settlement between mobile carriers and network operators.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: BSG Wireless handles mobile carrier and wi-fi network operator customer information to enable proper authentication for network roaming purposes.
recoursemech: BSG Wireless will work with the EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for the necessary data protections.
